import React from 'react' import { Card, Button } from 'semantic-ui-react' import '../stylesheets/PokeStats.css' class PokeStats extends React.Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { showButt: false } } showButt = () => { this.setState({ showButt: !this.state.showButt }) } render() { let showImg; const showFront = const showButt = const { name, hp, front, region, kind, back } = this.props.selectedPoke return (
{this.state.showButt ? showFront : showButt}
{showImg}

{name.toUpperCase()}

REGION: {region.toUpperCase()}

TYPE: {kind.toUpperCase()}

{hp}

{this.props.wild ? : }
) } } export default PokeStats
